categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Reise Durasha was a Human male from Lankashiir who served as Commander in the Imperial Army during the Galactic Civil War. He was also the father of Jak and Bern Durasha and the twins Celia and Raine Durasha.

Durasha was like many Imperials in the belief that women served no place in the Imperial Army or Navy. He went as far as, when his daughter Celia was attending Raithal Academy that he disallowed her from service. He would later inform her of Raine's death. Like his sons, he also was a graduate of Raithal Academy and often stopped by for guest lectures.
